history.title: Our History
history.description: In early 1994, the company has commenced its first steps in business as a business enterprise; since a shopping center specialized in household appliances was founded and the great success of the center was a motive to extend in business, then to take part in various specialized business, contracting and manufacture fields and, as well as a number of other sectors such as elevators. Then, the company was developed and turned into "Abdullah Abdulkarim Al Othaim United Company" acceleratingly within the last twenty years, which joins a number of specialized sectors in various business and service activities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide exceptional services and products across all our sectors while maintaining the highest standards of quality and customer satisfaction.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The core principles that guide everything we do

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Striving for the highest standards in everything we do

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Embracing new technologies and creative solutions

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Conducting business with honesty and transparency

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Committed to sustainable growth and environmental responsibility
